summary: Completed comprehensive testing of barber booking website. Backend APIs fully functional (16/16 tests passed). Frontend booking flow working end-to-end with successful booking creation and confirmation. Minor frontend validation issue identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Empty name field validation not showing error message on frontend

passed_tests: Homepage loads with SHARP CUTS hero section
BOOK NOW button scrolls to booking section
Calendar displays and allows date selection
Time slots load after selecting date
Contact form appears after time selection
Form accepts name + phone OR email
action_item_for_main_agent: Add frontend validation message for empty name field to improve user experience
